Greensboro.Hillside (Greensboro, North Carolina): Hillside, also known as the Julian Price House, is a historic mansion located in the Fisher Park neighborhood of Greensboro, Guilford County, North Carolina. It was designed by architect Charles C. Hartmann and built in 1929 for the businessman Julian Price. The house, a four-story, 31-room, 180 foot long dwelling in the Tudor Revival style, sits at 7,266 square-feet.
